data.title: The Infosphere, the Futurama Wiki
data.text:
Tertiary character

Pseudocharacter Joss WhedonAge1060Date of birth23 June, 1964SpeciesHumanPlanet of originEarth, United States of America, Old New YorkFirst appearance"Lrrreconcilable Ndndifferences" (6ACV11) Wikipedia has information unrelated to Futurama

In the 21st century, Joss Whedon was a screenwriter, producer, and director active in both television and film, although he was most notable for his work in the supernatural and science fiction genres, like the Buffy the Vampire Slayer series. Today, he is known as the creator of many comic books, and Leela claimed that he was attending Comic-Con 3010. Lrrr is apparently a fan of his, reacting excitedly upon hearing Leela say his name. [6ACV11]
